text: Jean (or Jehan) Fouquet (1420–1481) was an important French painter of the 15th century,Encyclopædia Britannica a master of both panel painting and manuscript illumination, and the apparent inventor of the portrait miniature. He was the first French artist to travel to Italy and experience first-hand the early Italian Renaissance. ==References== Category:1420 births Category:1481 deaths Category:French painters
title: Jean Fouquet
